rows.label: qst201107_msg0037
rows.name: You know, don't you?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0038
rows.name:
I think it's for the best if you didn't,
Mikumari.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0039
rows.name: If we tell you the truth, you'll-

rows.label: qst201107_msg0040
rows.name: Screw that!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0041
rows.name:
You know the kind of personality
I have. I never get depressed. Always
bubbly, looking to the future...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0042
rows.name: Rex... We should tell her.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0043
rows.name: All right.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0044
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0001
rows.name: Her name is Seori.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0002
rows.name: Seori...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0003
rows.name: You two used to be a team.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0004
rows.name:
A team? Fighting together like we
are now?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right. Except, you weren't
exactly doing good things.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0006
rows.name:
You called yourselves Core Crystal
hunters. You attacked people without
remorse and stole their Blades' Cores.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0007
rows.name:
What? Me...?
I...did awful things like that?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0008
rows.name: So...we used to be enemies?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0009
rows.name: We did.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0010
rows.name:
We had to cooperate with the
Superbian military to stop you.
And we fought in battle.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0011
rows.name: ...That's how your Driver died.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0012
rows.name:
So I would have returned to my
Core Crystal...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0013
rows.name: Yeah. Which we picked up.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0014
rows.name: But Seori and her Driver escaped.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0015
rows.name:
After that, she seemed to vanish off
the face of Alst.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0016
rows.name: I...I can't believe it. I was a criminal...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0017
rows.name: Mikumari... Best not to dwell on the past.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0018
rows.name:
You're our friend now, and that's
all that matters.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0019
rows.name:
But...Seori probably doesn't think
the same, does she?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0020
rows.name:
She probably thinks of me as
a traitor...

rows.label: qst201107_msg0021
rows.name: Mikumari, relax.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0022
rows.name:
We won't know what she thinks of you
unless we hear it from her directly.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0023
rows.name: But it surely won't be easy for you.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0024
rows.name:
We can go, but only if you think
you're up to it.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0027
rows.name:
I'm shocked, I can't deny that. Finding
out that you were a terrible person in
a past life...who wouldn't be?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0028
rows.name:
But...there's no reason to get all
depressed about it.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0029
rows.name:
In fact, now, I feel like I need to help
her. Just like how you all helped me.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0030
rows.name: I'll go. I'll meet her in person!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0031
rows.name:
We're behind you, Mikumari.
We go together, to save Seori!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0032
rows.name: Are you sure about this, Rex?

rows.label: qst201107_msg0033
rows.name:
It's better than moping around here,
isn't it? And besides, I want to help
Seori too.

rows.label: qst201107_msg0034
rows.name: Mikumari, let's do this!

rows.label: qst201107_msg0035
rows.name: Yeah!
